entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:51 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023
